name: MOONSHOT Pinball
description:
Moonshot Pinball, a prototype developed for Game Off 2020 promoted by itch.io and GitHub.

Source code is available at: https://github.com/RoloDMonkey/moonshot

The terms "Game Off", "Game Off 2020", "itch.io", "GitHub" and the Game Off logo are trademarks of their respective owners, and used with permission.

The background graphics were provided as part of the Game Off 2020 announcement on itch.io. Copyright of the background graphics is reserved by the creator and/or owner. If you know who the artist is, please let me know so that I can give them credit.
